transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Hello Ravindra sir, good morning, Manish bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello? Ji boliye.
Customer: Ravindra sir Manish bol raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Ji boliye na sir.
Executive: Accha sir do minute mujhe ek cheez batani thi aapko. Sir jitna ho sakta hai maine parso baat kari thi wo kal bhi maine sari jitna ho sakta hai R&D apne end se kari hai. Ek help kar dijiyega. Ek water softener ka jo product hai usme sir 23 hai aur water conditioner mein 22 hai. Thik hai na sir? To kya hota hai jis group mein jyada product hote hain us group ko thoda sa na product wo matlab ek person hota hai wo highlight thoda sa jyada hota hai. To do product agar aap chahe to madam se bol ke internal team se water conditioner wali group hai na jo apna usme do product sir add karwa dijiyega. Hai na sir please? To wo meri group na wo
Customer: Mujhe bhi laga waisa kuch issues ho sakta hai to maine abhi kiya hai do teen to kiya hai abhi hal filhal.
Executive: Ha 22 ho gaye sir usme. Actually sir ek antar hai. Water softener mein 23 hai aur water conditioner mein 22 hai. To agar do kar denge na koi bhi agar aap naye leke water conditioner ka bhi product agar usme add karke na water to do ho jayenge. Maine ladki se nahi bola maine kaha ek bar main unse sir se bol deta hu wo team ko bol denge.
Customer: Dunga main mujhe bhi waisa laga baat kiya.
Executive: Aur ek aur sir ek cheez aur hai. Sir ek aur cheez kya sir?
Executive: Haan ek cheez aur sir. Main na aapko na template link bhej raha hu. To ye template na sir thoda sa na template design mein na ye purana mujhe lag raha hai ki matlab na picture jo images hai na thoda sa nayi matlab thoda sa na visualization jyada hona chahiye to main kuch aapko template link bhej raha hu. To ek bar na wo selection dekh lijiyega kai sari design aati hai template ki website ki. To hum ek bar change kara le. Shayad usse theme bhi rahe na matlab hits kabhi kabhi badh jate hain sir. Hai na ye
Customer: Hai na? Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Haan wo bhi ho sakta hai. Main ek bar dekh lijiye sir main
Executive: Main bhej raha hu sir bilkul main mail pe hi laga ke bhej raha hu aapko. Sir kyunki main sara na jitna ho sakta hai usme mapping jitni bhi apne end se kar chuka hu. Kuch maine kal bhi baitha tha to mujhe do cheeze aur aayi ki usme ek product ko hum group ko aur badha le to mera wo water conditioner na top pe badh jayega. Uski sare product na jyada hi matlab fluctuate sare ke sare honge front page pe. Hai na website ke. To ye thoda sa matlab agar usse hame jump mil paye aur dusra ek hum template design change kar le itna cheez kar le.
Customer: Main bhej deta hu sir aapko. Main ye water conditioner ka karta hu abhi to do teen din pehle hi do teen product add kiya tha.
Executive: Sir do karne hai sir. Sir jyada bhi nahi karne only do karne hai. Only two. Hai na?
Customer: Main karwata hu iska kar deta hu uska keyword wagera search karke main kar deta hu.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul ek bar do karke dekh lijiye sir. Hai na aur main template design na aapko sir is number pe whatsapp hai kya aapke primary number pe?
Customer: Haan hai sir bhej dijiye bhej dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai maine sir abhi tak add nahi kiya tha aapko main primary pe aapko whatsapp link bhej wo template design ka link bhejta hu. To ek bar jara ek bar check karwa lijiyega koi bhi design agar ho aisa nahi ki ek hi bar kitni bar bhi aap change kar sakte ho. Mujhe ek bar bhej dena ki Manish ji ye design dekhiye dijiye is better hai agar kar de to main wo kara dunga change aapka. Thik hai na sir? Thoda sa waha se bhi kuch issue hai. Thik hai sir? Chalo. Thik hai sir. Main dekhiye. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add two products to water conditioner.

- Wants to change the template design.



Resolution:

- Agreed to add two products to water conditioner.

- Agreed to send the template link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- water conditioner, template, products, website
